categories.name: Software Development
categories.description: Software development encompasses the process of designing, coding, testing, and maintaining software applications.

categories.name: Cloud Services
categories.description: Cloud services refer to the delivery of computing services, including servers, storage, databases, networking, and software, over the internet.

categories.name: Cybersecurity solutions
categories.description: Cybersecurity solutions involve the technologies, practices, and processes designed to protect computer systems, networks, and data from cyber threats.

categories.name: Web Development
categories.description: Web development involves creating websites or web applications, including tasks such as web design, web content development, client-side/server-side scripting, and network security configuration.

categories.name: Data Science
categories.description: Data science combines statistics, mathematics, programming, and domain knowledge to extract insights and knowledge from data, enabling data-driven decision-making and predictive modeling.
